title: Open Communication Meetup! - Decentralized Social Networks
abstract: We will test, discuss and document decentralized and off the grid social networks, such as secure scuttlebutt SSCB.
description:
The goal behind [open-communication.net](https://open-communication.net) is to build a knowledge base on open decentralized communication tools. This is done collectively and collaboratively in 'Open Communication Meetups'.

In this meetup we will test, discuss and document existing decentralized and off-the-grid social networks, such as [secure scuttlebutt](https://scuttlebutt.nz/). 

Please bring your laptops and digital devices in order to collectively test the projects!

https://open-communication.net

persons.biography:
Mathias Jud is a berlin based artist. Since over twenty years, he works together with Christoph Wachter.
Their art works include open-source projects that uncover forms of censorship of the Internet, undermine the concentration of political power and even resolve the dependency on infrastructure.

https://www.wachter-jud.net/
